text: midneun jadeul-iyeo! anj-eun jalieseo nugungaga geudaedeul-ege “jalileul neolbhyeo jusio” lago malhamyeon neolbhyeo jula, hananimkkeseo geudaedeul-eul wihae neolbhyeo jusil geos-ila. nugungaga “il-eona jusio” lago malhamyeon geudaedeul-eun il-eona jula, hananimkkeseo geudaedeul jung-e midneun jadeulgwa jisig-eul bad-eun jadeul-ui wichileul nop-yeo jusil geos-ila. hananimkkeseoneun geudaedeul-i haenghaneun il-e balg-eusin bun-ila
